resources.string: Worked with BOFA Project network using retrofit API integration , did a POC to satisfy client and changing old school way of data fetching into Retrofit and worked with Google TV on bug fixing

My accomplishment , did NPSTJ public school application, whole school application in one month and BUYAWAY (E-commerce application)from scratch includes whole UI design , API integration and many features .

Did Marketing Tracking applications for collection agents for private concern , South Indian Foodie app(app for reviewing cuisines and restaurants) .And did one service based application from scratch named as Attendance App (Care India) .

Steven Rogers was born in the Lower East Side of Manhattan, New York City, in 1925 to poor Irish immigrants, Sarah and Joseph Rogers.[54] Joseph died when Steve was a child, and Sarah died of pneumonia while Steve was a teen. By early 1940, before Americas entry into World War II, Rogers is a tall, scrawny fine arts student specializing in illustration and a comic book writer and artist.
